product.title: Ratatouille | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Ratatouille

Kids are exposed to a whole new culture and cuisine with this unconventional Disney story, based on the wildly popular Pixar film. The story focuses on the unlikely friendship between Linguini, an orphaned aspiring chef, and Remy, a rat with a penchant for gourmet cooking. Through the plot’s twists and turns, kids will learn how pretending to be something you’re not can ultimately land you in hot water, and that sometimes the best of friends can be found in the most surprising places.

Tie-in Activity: Download an exotic recipe from another culture and let your child help with all aspects of the meal preparation—shopping for ingredients at the grocery store; chopping, mixing, and baking in the kitchen; and helping to set the table for the gourmet meal.
